quote.en: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quote.sw: Njia pekee ya kufanya kazi nzuri ni kupenda unachofanya.

bio.en: An American inventor, designer and entrepreneur who was the co-founder, chief executive and chairman of Apple Computer.
bio.sw: Mvumbuzi, mbunifu na mjasiriamali wa Marekani aliyekuwa mwanzilishi mwenza, mtendaji mkuu na mwenyekiti wa Apple Computer.

quote.en: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
quote.sw: Muda wako ni mchache, kwa hivyo usipoteze kuishi maisha ya mtu mwingine.

bio.en: An American inventor, designer and entrepreneur who was the co-founder, chief executive and chairman of Apple Computer.
bio.sw: Mvumbuzi, mbunifu na mjasiriamali wa Marekani aliyekuwa mwanzilishi mwenza, mtendaji mkuu na mwenyekiti wa Apple Computer.

quote.en: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quote.sw: Usijitahidi kuwa na mafanikio, bali kuwa wa thamani.

bio.en: A German-born theoretical physicist who developed the theory of relativity, one of the two pillars of modern physics.
bio.sw: Mwanafizikia wa kinadharia aliyezaliwa Ujerumani ambaye alitengeneza nadharia ya uwiano, moja ya nguzo mbili za fizikia ya kisasa.

quote.en: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quote.sw: Utukufu mkuu maishani si katika kutoanguka kamwe, bali katika kuinuka kila tunapoanguka.

bio.en: A South African anti-apartheid revolutionary and political leader who served as the first president of South Africa from 1994 to 1999.
bio.sw: Mwanamapinduzi na kiongozi wa kisiasa wa Afrika Kusini aliyepinga ubaguzi wa rangi na kutumikia kama rais wa kwanza wa Afrika Kusini kutoka 1994 hadi 1999.

quote.en: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quote.sw: Mustakabali ni wa wale wanaoamini katika uzuri wa ndoto zao.

title.en: First Lady of the United States

bio.en: An American political figure, diplomat and activist who served as the first lady of the United States from 1933 to 1945.
bio.sw: Mtu mashuhuri wa kisiasa, mwanadiplomasia na mwanaharakati wa Marekani aliyetumikia kama mke wa rais wa Marekani kutoka 1933 hadi 1945.

quote.en: An unexamined life is not worth living.

bio.en: A classical Greek philosopher credited as one of the founders of Western philosophy, and as being the first moral philosopher.
bio.sw: Mwanafalsafa wa Kigiriki wa kale anayetambuliwa kama mmoja wa waanzilishi wa falsafa ya Magharibi, na kama mwanafalsafa wa kwanza wa maadili.

quote.en: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quote.sw: Njia ya kuanza ni kuacha kuongea na kuanza kutenda.

title.sw: Mjasiriamali, Mchoraji Katuni, Mtayarishaji wa Filamu

bio.en: An American entrepreneur, animator, writer, voice actor, and film producer. A pioneer of the American animation industry.
bio.sw: Mjasiriamali, mchoraji katuni, mwandishi, muigizaji wa sauti, na mtayarishaji wa filamu wa Marekani. Painia wa tasnia ya uhuishaji ya Marekani.

quote.en: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quote.sw: Maisha ni yale yanayotokea unapokuwa na shughuli za kupanga mambo mengine.

bio.en: An English singer, songwriter, musician and peace activist who achieved worldwide fame as the founder of the Beatles.
bio.sw: Mwimbaji, mtunzi wa nyimbo, mwanamuziki na mwanaharakati wa amani wa Uingereza aliyepata umaarufu duniani kote kama mwanzilishi wa The Beatles.

quote.en: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
quote.sw: Niambie na nitasahau. Nifundishe na nitakumbuka. Nishirikishe na nitajifunza.

title.en: Founding Father of the United States

bio.en: An American polymath who was active as a writer, scientist, inventor, statesman, diplomat, printer, publisher, and political philosopher.
bio.sw: Msomi mahiri wa Marekani aliyekuwa mwandishi, mwanasayansi, mvumbuzi, kiongozi wa serikali, mwanadiplomasia, mchapishaji, na mwanafalsafa wa kisiasa.

quote.en: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quote.sw: Ni katika nyakati zetu za giza totoro ndipo tunapaswa kukaza macho kuona nuru.

bio.en: A Greek philosopher and polymath during the Classical period in Ancient Greece. Taught by Plato, he was the founder of the Lyceum.
bio.sw: Mwanafalsafa na msomi mahiri wa Ugiriki wakati wa Kipindi cha Kale nchini Ugiriki. Alifundishwa na Plato, alikuwa mwanzilishi wa Lyceum.

quote.en: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.
quote.sw: Utakumbana na vipingamizi vingi maishani, lakini usikubali kushindwa.

title.en: Poet, Memoirist, and Civil Rights Activist
title.sw: Mshairi, Mwandishi wa Kumbukumbu, na Mwanaharakati wa Haki za Kiraia

bio.en: An American poet, memoirist, and civil rights activist. She published seven autobiographies, three books of essays, and several books of poetry.
bio.sw: Mshairi, mwandishi wa kumbukumbu, na mwanaharakati wa haki za kiraia wa Marekani. Alichapisha tawasifu saba, vitabu vitatu vya insha, na vitabu kadhaa vya mashairi.

quote.en: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quote.sw: Mwishowe, siyo miaka katika maisha yako ndiyo muhimu. Ni maisha katika miaka yako.

bio.en: An American lawyer and statesman who served as the 16th president of the United States from 1861 until his assassination in 1865.
bio.sw: Mwanasheria na kiongozi wa serikali wa Marekani aliyetumikia kama rais wa 16 wa Marekani kutoka 1861 hadi kuuawa kwake mwaka 1865.

quote.en: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quote.sw: Safari isiyowezekana pekee ni ile usiyoianza kamwe.

bio.en: An American author, coach, speaker, and philanthropist. He is known for his infomercials, seminars, and self-help books.
bio.sw: Mwandishi, kocha, mzungumzaji, na mfadhili wa Marekani. Anajulikana kwa matangazo yake ya biashara, semina, na vitabu vya kujisaidia.

quote.en: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quote.sw: Mafanikio si ya mwisho, kushindwa si kifo: ni ujasiri wa kuendelea ndio muhimu.

title.en: Prime Minister of the United Kingdom

bio.en: A British statesman, soldier and writer who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1940 to 1945, and again from 1951 to 1955.
bio.sw: Kiongozi wa serikali, mwanajeshi na mwandishi wa Uingereza aliyetumikia kama Waziri Mkuu wa Uingereza kutoka 1940 hadi 1945, na tena kutoka 1951 hadi 1955.

quote.en: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
quote.sw: Kama maisha yangekuwa ya kutabirika yangekoma kuwa maisha, na yangekosa ladha.

title.en: First Lady of the United States

bio.en: An American political figure, diplomat and activist who served as the first lady of the United States from 1933 to 1945.
bio.sw: Mtu mashuhuri wa kisiasa, mwanadiplomasia na mwanaharakati wa Marekani aliyetumikia kama mke wa rais wa Marekani kutoka 1933 hadi 1945.
